summary: A compilation of my Hole in the Wall mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][b][size=14][color=#3174d2]Hole in the Wall - Compilation[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
[img]http://i1079.photobucket.com/albums/w503/ytnam/Skyrim/Hole%20in%20the%20Wall%20-%20Whiterun/Exterior01.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i1079.photobucket.com/albums/w503/ytnam/Skyrim/Hole%20in%20the%20Wall%20-%20Solitude/FrontDoor.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i1079.photobucket.com/albums/w503/ytnam/Skyrim/Hole%20in%20the%20Wall%20-%20Markarth/FromOutside.jpg[/img][/center]
A collection of player rooms with a small amount of storage and an alchemist's table, just outside the gate to the larger towns.
Locations include Whiterun, Solitude, Windhelm, Markarth and Riften.
Designed for starting new characters, just a small base until you find your feet or as a convenient place to camp overnight.
Minimal storage (all safe) and alchemy, with a campfire and cooking available.
All smithing stations and wood chopping available just inside the gates!


Credit to Mator for his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69905/?]Merge Plugins utility.[/url]


The Individual Mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56050/?]Hole in the Wall - Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58856/?]Hole in the Wall - Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58870/?]Hole in the Wall - Windhelm[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59194/?]Hole in the Wall - Markarth[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59939/?]Hole in the Wall - Riften[/url]


My other mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56840/?]Imperial Estate[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58544/?]Darkwater Cathedral[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63893/?]Ratway Manor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56222/?]House Strong-Blood[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56116/?] Strong-Blood Blacksmith[/url]
